text: --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- mada peradiga boho kalak rajakari kala lankikayek thamange nawathan kamarayedima awasan husma hela atha...
mathaka sita atham bhikshun atham (wishesha) awasthawala siwurata pitin bade redi patiyak (padili thumanla men) bandinu daknata labe.
gunasena mahathatath himiwa thibena bawa mama ada danagaththa.

pahugiya dawas tike eka pita eka anan manan hinda niskansuwe liyanta tharan hitha eka thanaka thibune nathi hindama wade tika tika pahu una..eeth man hithuwe..mekath ara anith eewa wage..ee kiwwe pansal katha..ethakota jun alage katha..ethanin giyahama mage bana kathandara tikata una wagema parana pothata yayido kiyalath..

mahiyanganaya rajaye guru puhunu madhyasthanaye di owunta me puhunuwa labadunne ranjith disanayaka ha nishantha bandara yana mahathwarunya.uuwa palath prathamika adhyapana katayuthu bhara sahakara adhyakshika bi.ee.je. jayawardhana mahathmiyath mahiyanganaya guru puhunu madhyasthana kalamanakaru wana wi.em. aariyapala mahathath owunta sahaya wuha.
lankawa wage ratakata anya aagam sampradayan paminima lankawata haniyak siduwiya haki bawata ape bauddhayanta atham wita sithennata athi.
mama danatamath ee nari gana danuwath wela inne.

adhikaranayata aashrayen, kiya»kiya dekak katha: ek kathawak gana dolar miliyana k rusiyanu badu wancha, saha thawath wenama kathawak gana nithyanukula depala wyapara»bawa pawasayi namuth, nithiya pasindalana»asamath dekak sambandha kirima sandaha»samagama bawa tharka karayi hitapu karyalaya pawasa atha»grafik ha sith sasala karawana kathawa gana»badu wancha saha maranaya, namuth pawathwagena bawa»ema chodana anadala kirimata»ha»nirmanaya kirimata patakaya paminilla ha nirmanaya kirimata erehiwa agathiya»saba wathu samagama.
eeth umbae wachaneta,hadawatha thuwalayi hondatoma..........
pare bahala yanna puluwan thaththwayak na kiyanne aththada?
mandayath eya antha dekak atharin apahasuwen watahagatha yuthu bawini.
thambaa raththaran pata hiru eliya wahi mara gahe athu aggissen lawata sudu pata biththi mathata wati atha.thorathonchiyak nathiwa kiyawana kurulu ran andurata hora thama kadali kara adi yathi.
meya ithama aprakata apa rata thula pawathina maha sanwedi prashnayak.
ali wata aluthwadiya karannath pawaranawa.
gati imata wela innawa...
eeta passe me gama palabathdola wela pasuwa palabaddala wunalu.

siwuwani ekdina tharagayedi nodawi lakunu 180 k raskala aarambhaka pithikaru matin gaptilge kadulla binda damu rabada, tharagawaliya purama lakunu athara siti jems nisham saha kolin di’grannghom aapasu kridagarayata harawa ariye je. pi. duminige saha swintin di’kokgeda saha athiwaya.
sabjekt ana saha but hewath koku ana kiyala ana warga dekak thiyenawa newa.
champika adu karama eeka gaurawaya aanduwata.
boho kal gatha wuwada
obata danenawa, therenawa maha wenasak jiwithaya thula siduwu bawa.
nathi nam “thoran” da?
hanganna deyak nathnan, sakki denna baya wenna ooneda?
monawa karannada ithin
mudal nisa yam ayek waradi kriya karanawanam ee bohowita mudal sadaha athi thanhawa, loba kama saha thama mudal balaya ayuthu lesa bawitha kirima wani waradi manasika thathwayan nisayi.

saukhya amathyawaraya labadun upadeswalata anuwa kloksisilin prathijiwaka aushadha thogaya rajaye rohal ha eeta anubaddha siyalu aayathanawala bhawithayen iwath kirimata adala chakralekhaya heta (03) nikuth kirimata niyamithayi.
brahaspathinda kolambaata kada wadunu boho denaku langa deshapalana paramartha thibune natha.
meya sanatha karanna ohu kisima sakshiyak idiripath kara naha.
jalaja pakshinge karachchalaya dupatha purama pathireyi.
loka saukhya sanwidhanaye upa sabhapathi dosthara rajitha senarathna mahatha piliganime uthsawaya ada
mahaththayane nam danna giye...
mema kunu thoga parisarayata wiwruthawa thabimen siduwiya haki parisara hani salaka mese kantenar pettiwalata athulath kara thabimata piyawara gath bawa da sabhapathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.
pradarshanaya awasanaye lada sulu wiweka kalaya ohu mema wesak kuduwa nirmanayata yoda gena atha.
meyata kantha sanwidana wala dadi pasasimata lakwiya yuthuwa thibunath mahamathiwarana kalayedi owunta wada wadi nisa eya yata giyeya.
ayi samaje de keya hadila thiyenne..
ema thiranaya janadhipathi jayawardhana jathika aarakshaka amathi athulathmudalita danum dunneya.
ee kiyanne miyusik paththatama (asanka ireshan - nuwara godak ewun danna ki bod ple karana niyama wada karayek).

ese wuwada mema rajya palanayata pera sitama mema pradeshawala aadiwasi janathawa jiwathwu bawa me haraha thahawuru wi athi bawath, wayambaa palatha pilibandawa hamuwana wishwasaniya kalanirnaya meya wana bawath mahacharya priyashantha gunawardhana prakasha kaleya.
age mathakayan wasarak thula ma kese nam wala damannada..?
harawum mesaya ada thibena dumriya enjin walatath bhawitha karanawada?
meken ekak pahadili wuna.
ee aakarshanayata aadaraya yayi nam thabimata ma uthsuka nowemi.
nishpadakaya wisin sapayana lada thorathuru desa balamu, pasuwa api apage parishilaka wartha pariksha karamu.
ee wagema ekak thamayi me widiyowath.
rohale dadi sathkara eekakaye age awasan mohothedi pawa kathandara poth genath dunna mangnyammawa aya anduna gaththa.
minissunta wathurawalin karanna puluwan thawa kochcharak nam wada thiyenawa da?

batahirayange diyunuwa ma deshapalanagnyayanta, niladharinta ha janathawata oona nam batahirayan kramayen me thathwayata aapu hati igena tiken tika eeniya diyunuwa kara apata oroththu dena wegayakin yanna oona.
habayi oya yata andum kathawata math ekangayi :
koheda yawanna masej enna epaya.
eeth thun kotasakata bedi ekineka samanga nithara pahe anda dabara ha yuddha walin gewa damu dirgha ithihasayak apata ehi dakinnata labe.
epamanak nowa kalayage awamen buduwarunge ganana da wadiwunu bawa pene.
wasara thihaka kuriru yuddhaya deparshwayema jiwitha boho gananak nathi kala.
wasara siya gananak thisse agnidiga aasiyawe hatagath shakamaya klona magin athiwishala duriyan upa wishesha pramanayak hatagena thibe.
lasantha sirura ada godata - kanaththata dadi aarakshawa: madhyawedihu eliye |
ehenam sansiduna wu ee parasaya thula anithyayak naha.
kammali kama paththakin dala..
rathu sariyenda hitiye?
ranjan-pradeshiya lekam durakathana sanwadaya maha...
thanpathkaruwan 800k paminili 200k ha ru.mi 680k waththe gedara niwasata chodana patha්rayak
wen karaganima kolambain sidukaragatha haka.
owunta kiyanna oyala aawe oyage amma hambenna kiyala
thopita oona deyak karanna nidahasa thiyenawa.
me ada pradarshanathmaka pawul jiwithaya wiya haki ya.

ahmadiyya muslim jamathaye paswani kalifa nayakawarayanan wisin loka samaya sthapitha kirima sandaha loka balawathun saha rajya thanthi්rakayinta dena lada agana deshanawan saha owunta yawu lipi gonuwa mema ga්ranthayehi athulath kara atha.
jathyanthara pasale igenuma labaddi sama wayase pasuwana iwonwa handuna gannata sharmanthata awasthawa labuneya.
kapithan sandars ee awasthawe niyamu kutiyata paminiyeya.
kapu wigasin nida ganna epa yayi upades labi nadda?
aadarabara wadanuth na.
pasuwa ribis pracharaka aayathanayata sambandha wu ohu ehi keti kalak pracharaka nirmanakaruwaku hatiyata sewaya kaleya.

'me kalakanniya, meka kalin hoyala aragena yanne na' kiyala hithin bana bana hari gedara aayo , me durastha , kadiya mud yanthareta pin sidda wenna , ithin sama de sama thana , welawak awelawak nobala sapayanna lesthi wela innawa...

rakiyawala wruththiya katayuthuwalata adala thirana gannata awashya thorathuru asanipawalata prathikara gannata awashya waidyawaru saha rohal pilibanda thorathuru bhanda milata gannata awashya welenda pola thorathuru igena ganima sandaha awashya adhyapanika thorathuru gamana gamanaya sandaha guwan saha dumriya tikatpath wenkara ganima, wahana thadabadaya dana ganima wani thorathuru kalagunika thorathuru winodathmaka katayuthu sandaha chithrapata, natya aadiya pradarshana adala thorathuru purawidyathmaka katayuthu sandaha purawasthu saha sel lipi wani de pilibanda thorathuru mema thorathuru laba gannata nawina minisata thorathuru thakshanaya wishala washayen pahasukam salasa de.
honda samasamaja karaya.
mewani awa­stha­waka poli­si­yata kala hakke kanthawa praka­shaya sata­han kara­gena adala puru­shaya genwa kata­u­ththa­ra­yak sata­han kirima pamani.
ee sandaha apata yojana kihipayak kala hakiya.
eeth akamaththakuth na.me parath shakirage thema githaya balanna nam aashawen innawa.
me “wagakiwa yuththoyi” kiyana (loku saha kuda) rajya niladharinuth deshapalanagnyayinuth sitinne thamanta saha thama paramparawalata wasthuwa hamba kara ganna misa wena kisima deyakata noweyi.
meke ganudenu tika siddha wenne samajikayagen samajikayata, palanayath ehemmayi.

bankok nagaraye pradhana madhya ohu gen prashna karana wita hethema kiya sitiye “pawule wyaparaya hini peththata nanwima wenuwata rata thula prajathanthrawadaya thahawuru kirime abhilashaya perata gena katayuthu karana” bawaya.
– mahindagen abhitha pa්rakashayak
mema sthana wadi washayenma wen wanne dura gaman sewa bas ratha sandahayi.
mage thawath (lokuma!!)abbahiyak thama menna meka!!

udenma nagena aluthenma gaththu kolapata ti shart eka andagena nilpata denimata nilpata bata kuttamath galapagena iskole yaddi pawichchi karapu bag ekath ellagena eliyata basse pothakuyi panakuyi yana gaman godage eka gawin bahala gannawa kiyala hithagena .
ape rate minissu desapaluwo kiyana katha walatath mechchara kamathi ee nisada danne naha.
mona tharan wahan haduwath rosa mala karapu de piyalta hondata theruna .
samahara wita me ekkama wamanaya , mala paha ekka le pitawim aarambha wannatath ida thibenawa .
mama ee gana hadarala thiyena nisa ee paththen issarahata yanna lesiyi.
ranilge seppuwa purawannada nathnam labana chandetada ehemath nathnam wyawasthawa sammatha karaganna oona chanda tika salli walata gannada.
naduwa thiyena hama dawasakadima mama mage thaththage minimaruwo dakinawa.

me awasthawedi thripudgala shershtadhikarana winisuru mandulle pradhanathwaya daru agawinisuruwaraya athireka solisitar janaralwaraya amathamin wadiduratath wimasa sitiye, widhayakaya wisin pathkaranu labana adhyaksha janaralwarayakuta yam balapamak ho balakirimak wuwada sidukirimata widhayakaye yam ihala nilayak darannaku hata athi awakashayath ee anuwa siduwiya hakiwa athi awadanamath bahara kala nohaki bawaya.
“yako mama kiwwe daganne nathuwa kis ekak ganna widiha“
thamilnadu dhiwarayinwa shri lanka nawika hamudawa ath adanguwata ganna sama awasthawakadima owunwa nidahas karaganimata thamilnadu rajaya akhanda uthsahayan gani.
kop kamitu warthawa idiripath karanna kalin parlimenthuwa wisiruwala dan kiyanawada wada walata, usawiyata enna kiyala?
owunata da jiwathwime "nidahaswa swadhinawa jiwathwimata" purna ayithiyak atha.
rawindra randeniya saha toni ranasinha ekkayi nilupage charithaya mata karanna labune.
awasana washayen wishala wandiyak gewannata sidu wuna athara e් minis ghathana athyawashya e්wa no wi ya.
lankawe adhikarana paddhathiyada wenath boho ansha menma karyakshama natha.
eda api godak dewal katha kala.
mama enakota ma ekka ee hathara denath aawa.
api dennage padiyen pawulak nadaththu karanna amaru nisa mama job dekak kala.
ada ape ofis eke ekata wada karana ganu lamayekge magul geyak.
anith aya lina dewal balala.
eelangata mokada une?
ee nisa thawama wayasa thiyenawa.
- waren, awith pennapan
uthure militarikaranaya gana sarasawi aduru wirodhaya uthure digatama pawathwagena yanu labana hamudakaranaya pilibanda biyakaru […]
eda ee karanna patan gaththa kapawima adath ehemamayi.
namuth nitharama paribhogikayage wiyadam mulashra wadi wanawa.
bulath wita sapima da wadagath karunaki.
keneku andhawana karana bohoya.
kisima ekangathawayakata enna baha?
kiriwehera desata yaddi eelagata hamuwenne menna me aya...
ithin dineshayiya awasaneta liyapu "sigarattuwe ithihasaya" lipiya kiyawana athare ekaparatama mage nalale dakunu paththen sudu dumarayak wage bhuthayek eliyata lissuwa.
kohomada eeka wada karanne?
ohu kath adinneki.
mokakda oyata karanna puluwanne, oliwar?
mema kappaduwata sobhana wyapruthiwalata janawari masaye sita sisun samakami wirodhatha aarambha kala.
"ran aswanu neluwo wemu..."
miltange sindu kiyanne ithin bokka kadagena, papuwa kadagena gihilla dawas ganak aathak pathak nathi wenawa ban”
podi kale ape niwase athi padan ballan pusan siti nisada manda man nam sathunta wadi kamaththak na.
obath me ek ek anshayan pilibada mana danumak athi pudgalayeku nam, kandayam hagimen wada kala haki pudgalayeku nam me obe awasthawayi.
ape bayik peralena, happena chans wadiyi wagema damejuth wadiyi...
eyanam, ihatha sinamapataya mastarpis ganaye nirmanayak da yanna wimasa balimayi.
esema obata wadihiti nadayingen depala ha yana wahana labime awastha da uda wanu atha.
me loken uthum rata wu shri lankawayi.
ehi palamu pitapatha sangarawe pradhana kathru...
sidda wechcha de gananam dukayi chamiyo.
shakthimath banku jalayak thibenawa.
ee kale mata mathakayi wirul ekka gaman giya hati pinthura fesbuk eke dala thiyenawa......

eheth ada ewani thaththwayak daknata nolabena bawath,wipakshaye naduhaba ha pethsam wenuwen kisidu balapamakin thorawa adhikaranaya idiriye peni sitinnata nithignyayinta athi ayithiya wadath thahawuru kara athi bawa ohu sandahan kaleya.

lankawata pamini pasu hath ata warakma ithali thanapathi karyalayata gos me pilibandawa wimasa sitiyada owun wisin ohuwa rasthiyadu karamin nawatha nawatha pamina balana lesa danwanawa misa prathipaladayaka yamak nowuni.
dan obe durakathana samaga oba pamanak nowa haki amathum pamanak nowa, winodaswadaya sandaha thama.
sathuta yayi kiya apa hama thissema walanda ganne duka bawa me nawakathawe charitha thulin kathuwaraya mathu karayi.
depaththema inne minissu.
sinhala liyamu !
saban ha wathuren thathpara 20k ho ath sodanna.
eyalath milan ayiyata aadare kale eyalagema daruwekuta wage..
mamath godak manasika prashna walata muna dunna kenak.
udena raju kiwe thamata wandinne nam eya laba diya haki bawayi.

ema kumanthranaya sandaha rajya buddhi sewaye adhyaksha nilantha jayawardhana saha balagathu deshapalana thanaththan kihipadeneku awul wi thibena bawata da polispathiwaraya siya diwurum pethsama magin karunu dakwa thibena bawa sandahan kala nithipathiwaraya mema chodanawa mulumaninma padanam wirahitha, asathya menma dwesha sahagatha bawa kiya sitiyeya.
man yanna yedimata siduwana awasthawala di, enam wiyuktha minisa gana sandahan kirimata awashya wu wita api minisunge aadi washayen bahuwachana swarupaya yoda ganimu.
namuth dan sara adu biyar panaye nam wadiwimak pennum karanawa" yayi surabadu komasaris janaral wasantha hapuaarachchi mahatha anuradhapura sahal sakasum madhyasthanaye di pawasiya.
ese wuye kawadath kothanath thibune eka ma swabhawadharmaya saha eka ma minis indriya paddhathiyak nisa bawini.
maraya ayiyata marama addekim tikakne thiyenne.hamudawe jiwithe katta kiyala hithunata, podi pahe fan ekakuth thiyanwa neda?
sadacharaya yanu sathyakda, nathahoth kenekta sapekshawu adahasakda kiyana ekayi methana thibena prashnaya.
katha dekak !
dengu mardhanayata kilinochchi bhata piris sahaya
(wishwawidyala praweshaya no labe yayi sithagena).
antharjalaya bhawithayedi dakina wiwidha ingrisi wachana wala theruma hoyaganna shabdakosha peralanna dan oona wenne naha!

yam lesakin, maitha්ripala sirisena nowana ayaku podu apekshakaya wi obata erehiwa tharaga kota oba parajayata path wuye nam, ewita obata ha sha්rilanipa pakshikayanta athwindimata thibu iranama kumakda yanna sitha balana lesa mama obata yojana karami.
